Description: Reverend Reeves Gabrels Spacehawk Condition: This Spacehawk is in excellent shape. Serial number: 29703 Weight: 8.17 lbs The Reeves Gabrels Spcehawk signature model was designed in collaboration with The Cure artist himself.  It's loaded with legendary Railhammer pickups: a Hyper-Vintage in the neck and a Chisel in the bridge, and can cover everything from high-gain shred to rock to heavy blues.  Tradition meets modern powerhouse! Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Semi-hollow korina, solid maple top Body Color/Finish: Metallic alpine Neck Wood: Three-piece korina Neck Profile: Medium oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Set Neck Fingerboard: Rosewood Fingerboard Inlays: Dots Frets: 22 medium jumbo Nut: Graphite Nut Width: 1-11/16" (43mm) Tuners: Revernd pin-lock Scale Length: 24.75" Bridge: Bigsby B-50 with roller bridge Pickups: Railhammer Chisel bridge, Hyper-Vintage neck Controls: Volume, tone, bass contour, kill toggle, phase, 3-way Jack: Side Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Not Included Country Of Origin: Korea Switching: Without/With Coil Tap P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge and Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
